overview: Filmed in Mexico, Indonesia, Tahiti and California, this skim-boarding love-fest toasts the sport's sheer lunacy with loads of eye-popping footage. Larger-than-life personalities such as Beaker, Koty Lopez, Morgan Just and George Bryan converge on the planet's most renowned skim-boarding hot spots, including Todos Santos Island, Teahupo'o, Los Cabos and the notorious Wedge at Newport Beach.
title: Best Trip Ever
